name: All Ctrl
description:
Made for GMTK Jam - Theme of the jam was Out of Control, So naturally i wanted the controls to... well.. be out of Ctrl, The only two buttons needed are Right and Left Control to pivot your ship and shoot!

Left Ctrl - Turn Left

Right Ctrl - Turn Right

Both Ctrl's - Pan Upwards

Neither - Pan Slowly Down

When Both are pressed in unison one laser will fire!

The asteroids are controlled by gravity finding their center so quickly they will all coalesce around the player so take out as many as you can before you explode! High score should be working and save to each persons version too which is something new for me to have done!

Highest score seen was 1300! see if you can beat it :)

I'm super happy with how it turned out as its my first solo Games Jam, As well i only had about 7 hours of free time to actually make it! So I'm amazed there is anything there at all.
